verses.name: Joshua 18:1
verses.text: And the whole congregation of the children of Israel assembled together at Shiloh, and set up the tabernacle of the congregation there. And the land was subdued before them.

verses.name: Joshua 18:2
verses.text: And there remained among the children of Israel seven tribes, which had not yet received their inheritance.

verses.name: Joshua 18:3
verses.text: And Joshua said unto the children of Israel, How long are ye slack to go to possess the land, which the Lord God of your fathers hath given you?
